inclusion.criterion: not admitted within 14 days before diagnosing pneumonia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: not met the criteria of HCAP criteria
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: HAP: pneumonia developed two days after admission or within 14 days after discharge (except RCW)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: VAP: HAP and with mechanical ventilation for at least 48h (except RCW patients)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male who was admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite. He had traveled to India 1 months ago and has not any positive history of TB vaccination.
